unnormalised: Arre, aiklay mhaka? Sharmak SDM mhunn promote kela! Dista, sogllea tannachea kamacho faido zala, hã?
normalised: Arre, aiklay tumi? Te Sharma babank S-D-M mhunn promote kela! Dista tem sakdda mehenatic fal mell'lla, kai?
text: Arre, aiklay mhaka? Sharmak SDM mhunn promote kela! Dista, sogllea tannachea kamacho faido zala, hã?
